Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openig.heap.Heap

  • Packages that use Heap 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openig.heap
    Manages collections or "heaps" of associated objects, initialized from declarative configuration artifacts.

    • Uses of Heap in org.forgerock.openig.heap

      class  HeapImpl
      The concrete implementation of a heap.

      Where objects should be put and where object dependencies should be retrieved.

      Retrieves an object from a heap with the specified name and type, or null if the name is null.
